Package org.sugarcubes.cloner

Class CloningPolicyHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sugarcubes.cloner.CloningPolicyHelper
  • public class CloningPolicyHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods which do not belong to CloningPolicy interface but are (re)used in the code.

    • Method Summary

      • isFinalAndImmutable

        public static boolean isFinalAndImmutable​(CloningPolicy policy,
                                          java.lang.Class<?> type)
        Returns true if type is immutable and final. This means there is no mutable subtype of this type.
        Parameters:
        policy - cloning policy
        type - type
        Returns:
        true if type is immutable and final

      • isComponentTypeImmutable

        public static boolean isComponentTypeImmutable​(CloningPolicy policy,
                                               java.lang.Class<?> componentType)
        Returns true if array component type or field type guarantees that the stored value is immutable. We cannot use isImmutable(componentType), because, for instance, the value of field defined as private BigInteger value; will be immutable value in this case, although it can refer to some mutable subtype of BigInteger.
        Parameters:
        policy - cloning policy
        componentType - array component type of field type
        Returns:
        true if value guaranteed to be immutable
